title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 603.9 - Expenses of hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 603.9 - Expenses of hearing

State Regulations

The expenses of such hearing must be borne by the
applicant. The commission will audit bills for such expenses and certify them
to the applicant for payment. It is incumbent on the applicant to pay such
bills to the persons entitled thereto within 30 days of such
certification. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
603.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
